languages.text: "Но... они говорили про скорый конец! Они обещали спасение! Я больше ничего не хотел!" {n}Оружие падает из рук мужчины на землю. Он хватается за голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но... они говорили про скорый конец! Они обещали спасение! Я больше ничего не хотел!" {n}Оружие падает из рук мужчины на землю. Он хватается за голову.{/n}

languages.text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но... они говорили про скорый конец! Они обещали спасение! Я больше ничего не хотел!" {n}Оружие падает из рук мужчины на землю. Он хватается за голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
"But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
"But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
"But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
"But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
"But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}

languages.text: "Aber ... sie haben gesagt, dass das Ende naht! Sie haben Erlösung versprochen! Mehr wollte ich doch nicht!" {n}Die Waffe des Mannes fällt ihm aus den Händen und landet auf dem Boden. Er rauft sich die Haare.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber ... sie haben gesagt, dass das Ende naht! Sie haben Erlösung versprochen! Mehr wollte ich doch nicht!" {n}Die Waffe des Mannes fällt ihm aus den Händen und landet auf dem Boden. Er rauft sich die Haare.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais... on m'a dit que la fin était proche ! On m'a promis le salut ! Je ne voulais rien d'autre ! » {n}s'exclame l'homme en laissant tomber son arme avant de se prendre la tête entre les mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais... on m'a dit que la fin était proche ! On m'a promis le salut ! Je ne voulais rien d'autre ! » {n}s'exclame l'homme en laissant tomber son arme avant de se prendre la tête entre les mains.{/n}

languages.text: “但是……他们说末日快到了！他们承诺会给我们救赎！除此之外，我真的别无所求了！”{n}老人紧紧抓住了自己的头，手中的武器掉到了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “但是……他们说末日快到了！他们承诺会给我们救赎！除此之外，我真的别无所求了！”{n}老人紧紧抓住了自己的头，手中的武器掉到了地上。{/n}

languages.text: 「だが…彼らは終焉が近いていると言った！救済を約束されたのだ！私は、それ以外の何も望んでいなかった！」{n}男の手から武器が地面に落ち、彼は頭を抱え込んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だが…彼らは終焉が近いていると言った！救済を約束されたのだ！私は、それ以外の何も望んでいなかった！」 {n}男の手から武器が地面に落ち、彼は頭を抱え込んだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Pero... ¡dijeron que el final estaba cerca! ¡Prometieron la salvación! ¡Solo quería eso!». {n}El arma del hombre cae al suelo. Se agarra la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero... ¡dijeron que el final estaba cerca! ¡Prometieron la salvación! ¡Solo quería eso!». {n}El arma del hombre cae al suelo. Se agarra la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: "Ama... Son yakın demişlerdi! Kurtuluş sözü vermişlerdi! Tek isteğim buydu!" {n}Adamın silahı elinden yere düşüyor. Başını elleri arasına alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But... they said the end was near! They promised salvation! I wanted nothing else!" {n}The man's weapon falls from his hands to the ground. He clutches his head.{/n}
